name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Victus Vibe Pink Crayon Drop 10 USSSA Baseball Bat, a game-changer for young athletes seeking precision and power. This bat features a USSSA 1.15 BPF certification and a mid-balanced swing feel, ensuring optimal performance on the field. Crafted from a one-piece alloy composite with a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, its striking pink and black colorway is sure to stand out. The VXP Alloy construction enhances pop and durability, while the ringless barrel design provides a thinner, more flexible sweet spot. With an ergonomic handle taper and micro-perforated soft-touch grip, this bat offers superior control and feel for every swing. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
